resources.string:
【INTRODUCTION】
 《Desktop PET：OP》V5 Update, add online download rescourse. Update again, thank you for your support! This version include: Luffy, Zoro, Law and Chopper.
 This lovely person can show in any screen, never confined to the wallpaper, just show it. It also can show the date time for you. Fans of One Piece, get it for your phone now!

 【VERSION HISTORY】
 Ver5.1.1:
 1、Fix server errors
 2、Add My apps
 【HELP】
 Don not delete the rescourse after download, if any error, you can download the person again.
 Thank you!
Web：http://0kai.net(Receiving feedback)\nWaiting for new Ver. & more apps
谢谢旧版用户的支持，奖励50积分

score, never show ad after remove it.

*2*If you don't have enough score, get it free!

Only display on desktop and this app
Long touch the person without move, start the app for setting
Move the person to the left/right of screen would show date/time
Click to chose the size of animation
Click to chose the running speed of animation
Running Speed(more faster more power would need)
Click to chose the frequency of actions
Move ad and wouldn\'t show again. Ad will not trouble for your using
Show the pet after startup the phone
Downloaded, please select in local setting.

*2*You can get the point by free!
*2*After downloaded, do not delete the data。
*3*If you had delete the data or some error, download again。
*4*If out of memory or no sdcard may cause error.
